Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the failure to produce records in response to a FOIL request; and criminalizes the failure to comply with the freedom of information law
Summary: Relates to the failure to produce records in response to a FOIL request; criminalizes the failure to comply with the freedom of information law.
LawCode: Amd §§86 & 89, Pub Off L; add Title P Art 285 §285.05, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the failure to produce records in response to a FOIL request; and to amend the penal law, in relation to criminalizing the failure to comply with the freedom of information law
